scripts.build: node scripts/build-dictionary.mjs && node scripts/migrate-to-internal-structure.mjs && node scripts/chunk-dictionary-for-scale.mjs && astro build
scripts.update-content: node scripts/build-dictionary.mjs && node scripts/migrate-to-internal-structure.mjs && echo 'Contenido actualizado con estructura interna'
scripts.dictionary-legacy: npm run build-dictionary && npm run partition-dictionary
